title: Office Stamp Authority or an officer appointed by it (*) Name of the Act of the Planning Authority, if any, be mentioned or concerned sentence be deleted
clause_text: Office Stamp Authority or an officer appointed by it (*) Name of the Act of the Planning Authority, if any, be mentioned or concerned sentence be deleted. (Specimen of Stamp of Approval to be marked on Layout plan) ** Name of the Municipal Corporation / Council / Nagar Panchayat / Collector shall be mentioned.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
